sentences.sentence: Diagnosis and treatment of anorectal injuries.
sentences.translation: 肛管直肠损伤的诊断和治疗。

sentences.sentence: Methods: 900 cases of outpatient anorectal surgery wound using MEBO.
sentences.translation: 方法：对900例门诊肛肠手术后创面使用MEBO治疗。

sentences.sentence: Results: 900 cases of anorectal surgery surgical wounds healed well.
sentences.translation: 结果：900例肛肠手术患者手术创面愈合良好。
